summary: The implementation successfully addresses all four requirements. The backend includes an isAdmin() method checking the hardcoded principal, the frontend hook useIsAdmin calls this method, the AdminDashboardPage displays access control and placeholder sections, and the routing is properly configured. All acceptance criteria appear to be met based on the diff evidence.

hallucinated_features.description: Navigation buttons and click handlers for placeholder sections (Stripe Settings, User Management, Revenue Analytics, Branding) that navigate to other admin pages
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 specifies placeholder sections for future features, but the implementation adds interactive navigation buttons with onClick handlers and useNavigate calls to existing admin pages. This goes beyond displaying placeholder sections.

hallucinated_features.description: Additional admin dashboard menu item in Layout navigation dropdown
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement specified updating the Layout component or adding a Dashboard link to existing admin navigation. This is a navigation enhancement not requested in the BuildRequest.

hallucinated_features.description: Hook named useIsCallerAdmin in Layout component instead of useIsAdmin
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 specifies creating a hook named useIsAdmin, but Layout.tsx uses a differently named hook useIsCallerAdmin which suggests either a duplicate implementation or naming inconsistency not specified in requirements.
